Name: The Raven - Legacy of a Master Thief Episode 1
Overview: Set across 1960's Europe, The Raven is a fast-paced point-and-click adventure journeying through thrilling and dense atmospheres with the aim of catching the art burglar, The Raven. Players follow The Raven's trademark black feather clues to capture the thief and to protect a legendary sapphire, the "Eye of the Sphinx" on its journey from Switzerland to Egypt.
